validation.itemExists: An item titled "${name}" is already available in this folder. Please choose a different title.
validation.titleInUseService: A layer titled "${name}" is already available. Please select a different title.
validation.serviceNameInvalid: The title of a service may only contain alphanumeric characters or underscores and be 90 characters or less.
validation.dataStoreTitleInvalid: The title of a data store may only contain alphanumeric characters or underscores and be 90 characters or less.
validation.titleInvalid: The title must be less than 250 characters and cannot contain < or >.
